meanings.sent1: Her estimations of the distance were quite accurate.
meanings.sent2: The estimations for the project completion date varied among team members.
meanings.sent3: During the game, his estimations of the score were always way off.
meanings.sent4: In the dark forest, their estimations of the path ahead were their only guide.
meanings.sent5: The detective's estimations led him to the hidden treasure.

meanings.sent1: The estimations of the cost were presented to the client.
meanings.sent2: Her quick estimations helped in planning the event efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The estimations of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: In the art of negotiation, estimations play a crucial role.
meanings.sent5: The estimations of the chef resulted in a perfectly cooked meal.
